text:
Put the fun into the toast!
$5.90 for the kaya butter toast and eggs!

Big big cup of coffee, kopi c kosong, not bitter and goes down smooth.

Clean and plenty is seating capacity.

no fun at this Fun Toast.
Many dirty tables. Staff are impatient and show irritation. Coffee which normally smooth is bitter

Never had such experience at other Fun Toast establishments.

Management better take a look

Today was my first time trying out Funtoast at Harbourfront and unfortunately am not impressed. Just to pack an order of Mee Siam, I had to wait 20 mins,, why coz one of the staff was busy on his handphone instead of tending to my order.
Worst fun toast w grumpy loud and rude Indian cashier/order taker, made mistake on order and insisted is custome's fault, raised voice and made cups of bad coffees. Fun toast is no fun here
Great toasts, many choices for both food and drinks. They don’t have many tables but it’s a good open area inside HBF mall. Service is quick though numbers aren’t called in order.
